title: 12 Year Old Arrested For Hate Crime
description:
Music: www.purple-planet.com
In this video I discuss the story of a 12 year old boy being charged with a felony due to the state of our country. While what he did wasn't good and deserves a punishment. The lack of scale in this story is troubling.
